title: In a club but not in a club! Help please!
body: So I created a club when they first came out with a few others and all was well, rocking my club tag quite happily. Sometime ago, during one of the updates, I was removed from my club, no long with my sweet tag, but I'm still in the club, still lead, yet not actually in it. All in the club still see me yet I can't do anything, nor can I leave the club and rejoin. Help?

replies.body: Let me know what the name of that club is and I can make sure you're able to see it again!
Name's Two Drink Minimum, abbreviation is 2DM. Jimizzle and Apcarnist should also be in said club.
Check it now, should be g2g!
Yay! Thank you so much! Back to rocking my tag!
